00007 #include "G4UIcmdWithABool.hh"
00008 
00009 // C++
00010 #include <sstream>
00011 
00012 namespace ldmx {
00013 
00014     TrackProcessSaverMessenger::TrackProcessSaverMessenger(TrackProcessSaver* plugin) :
00015             UserActionPluginMessenger(plugin), plugin_(plugin) {
00016 
00017         addProcessCmd_ = new G4UIcommand(std::string(getPath() + "addProcess").c_str(), this);
00018         addProcessCmd_->SetGuidance("Add a creator physics process name for saving tracks.");
00019         addProcessCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00020 
00021         G4UIparameter* processName = new G4UIparameter("processName", 's', false);
00022         processName->SetGuidance("Name of Geant4 physics process to save");
00023         addProcessCmd_->SetParameter(processName);
00024 
00025         G4UIparameter* exactMatch = new G4UIparameter("exactMatch", 'b', true);
00026         exactMatch->SetGuidance("True if process name match should be exact");
00027         addProcessCmd_->SetParameter(exactMatch);
00028     }
00029 
00030     TrackProcessSaverMessenger::~TrackProcessSaverMessenger() {
00031     }
00032 
00033     void TrackProcessSaverMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand *command, G4String newValue) {
00034 
00035         // Handles verbose command.
00036         UserActionPluginMessenger::SetNewValue(command, newValue);
00037 
00038         if (command == addProcessCmd_) {
00039             std::stringstream ss(newValue);
00040             std::string processName;
00041             bool exactMatch = false;
00042             ss >> processName;
00043             if (!ss.eof()) {
00044                 std::string exactMatchStr;
00045                 ss >> exactMatchStr;
00046                 exactMatch = G4UIcommand::ConvertToBool(exactMatchStr.c_str());
00047             }
00048             plugin_->addProcess(processName, exactMatch);
00049         }
00050     }
00051 }
